messages.subject: Uncle sam wants you -- to shop
messages.msgSnippet: In World War II when a dictator threatened world peace, Americans rose to the occasion and fearlessly performed their patriotic duty to their country. Today we
messages.messageBody:
In World War II when a dictator threatened world peace, Americans rose to
the occasion and fearlessly performed their patriotic duty to their country.

Today we are threatened with a poor quarterly economic report, and Americans
are once again rising to the challenge by fearlessly braving long lines,
parking hassles, and sore feet as they turn the tide by charging
relentlessly in the nations' malls and retail stores.

Such acts of bravery and patriotism bring tears to my eyes and send shivers
down my spine.

http://www.jsonline.com/business/champy/980916unclesamwantsyoutosho.asp


John Andersen
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen
